attributes.description:
Extended BMW Motorplan until 27th of February 2023!

Features:
Mineral Grey Metallic,
Leather Dakota Black with blue stitching,
M double-clutch transmission with Drivelogic,
Tyre Pressure Monitoring,
Comfort Access,
Rearview camera,
Glass Sunroof, electric with sliding and vent function,
Sun protection glazing,
Seat adjustment, electric with memory for driver's seat,
Through-load Facility,
Lumbar support for the driver and front passenger(electrically adjustable),
Park Distance Control (PDC) Rear,
Adaptive headlights,
Extended Light Package,
High Beam Assist,
Hi-fi Loudspeaker System Harman/Kardon,
Concierge Services,
Remote Services,
Convenience telephony with extended smartphone connectivity,
ConnectedDrive services package,
Shipping protection,
ZA Model Enhancement 07/2016,
Xenon headlights,
Navigation System,
Intelligent emergency calling,

Picture the perfect sports coupe and then open your eyes to this 2017 BMW M2 Coupe. As you park and walk away from it, you’re sure to have a smile on your face. There are very few M2s that come as well equipped as this example. An Extended BMW Motorplan until 2023 has been optioned as well as the very best in M Performance adornments, including; BMW racing Blue Brake Calipers, an Exposed Carbon Fibre Interior, Rear Park Distance Control, and a beautifully styled Rear Spoiler. You’ll be hard-pressed to find another model like this! Get in touch about booking a test drive today!  

Nationwide Delivery.
T's & C's Apply.
e&oe
